verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> of David שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> [and] Song לְךָ֤ דֻֽמִיָּ֬ה <WH1747> waiteth תְהִלָּ֓ה <WH8416> Praise אֱלֹ֘הִ֥ים <WH430> for thee O God בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> in Sion וּ֝לְךָ֗ יְשֻׁלַּם־ <WH7999> be performed נֶֽדֶר׃ <WH5088> and unto thee shall the vow
שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <WH8085> O thou that hearest תְּפִלָּ֑ה <WH8605> prayer עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <WH5704> to You כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> unto thee shall all flesh יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <WH935> come

דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> act עֲ֭וֹנֹת <WH5771> Iniquities גָּ֣בְרוּ <WH1396> prevail מֶ֑נִּי <WH4480> against פְּ֝שָׁעֵ֗ינוּ <WH6588> against me [as for] our transgressions אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You תְכַפְּרֵֽם׃ <WH3722> thou shalt purge them away

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <WH835> Blessed תִּֽבְחַ֣ר <WH977> [is the man whom] thou choosest וּתְקָרֵב֮ <WH7126> and causest to approach יִשְׁכֹּ֪ן <WH7931> [unto thee that] he may dwell חֲצֵ֫רֶ֥יךָ <WH2691> in thy courts נִ֭שְׂבְּעָה <WH7646> we shall be satisfied בְּט֣וּב <WH2898> with the goodness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> of thy house קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <WH6918> [even] of thy holy הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1964> temple

נ֤וֹרָא֨וֹת ׀ <WH3372> [By] terrible things בְּצֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> in righteousness תַּ֭עֲנֵנוּ <WH6030> wilt thou answer אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <WH3468> of our salvation מִבְטָ֥ח <WH4009> [who art] the confidence כָּל־ <WH3605> of all קַצְוֵי־ <WH7099> of all the ends אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיָ֣ם <WH3220> [upon] the sea רְחֹקִֽים׃ <WH7350> and of them that are afar off
מֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> setteth fast הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> the mountains בְּכֹח֑וֹ <WH3581> Which by his strength נֶ֝אְזָ֗ר <WH247> [being] girded בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <WH1369> with power

מַשְׁבִּ֤יחַ ׀ <WH7623> Which stilleth שְׁא֣וֹן <WH7588> the noise יַ֭מִּים <WH3220> of the seas שְׁא֥וֹן <WH7588> the noise גַּלֵּיהֶ֗ם <WH1530> of their waves וַהֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> and the tumult לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> of the people

וַיִּ֤ירְא֨וּ ׀ <WH3372> are afraid יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> They also that dwell קְ֭צָוֹת <WH7098> coast מֵאוֹתֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH226> at thy tokens מ֤וֹצָֽאֵי־ <WH4161> thou makest the outgoings בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> of the morning וָעֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> and evening תַּרְנִֽין׃ <WH7442> to rejoice

פָּקַ֥דְתָּ <WH6485> Thou visitest הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <WH776> the earth וַתְּשֹׁ֪קְקֶ֡הָ <WH7783> and waterest רַבַּ֬ת <WH7227> it thou greatly תַּעְשְׁרֶ֗נָּה <WH6238> enrichest פֶּ֣לֶג <WH6388> it with the river אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> of God מָ֣לֵא <WH4390> [which] is full מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water תָּכִ֥ין <WH3559> thou preparest דְּ֝גָנָ֗ם <WH1715> them corn כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֵ֥ן <WH3651> thus תְּכִינֶֽהָ׃ <WH3559> when thou hast so provided

תְּלָמֶ֣יהָ <WH8525> the ridges רַ֭וֵּה <WH7301> thereof abundantly נַחֵ֣ת <WH5181> thou settlest גְּדוּדֶ֑יהָ <WH1417> ridges בִּרְבִיבִ֥ים <WH7241> with showers תְּ֝מֹגְגֶ֗נָּה <WH4127> thereof thou makest it soft צִמְחָ֥הּ <WH6780> the springing תְּבָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1288> thou blessest
עִ֭טַּרְתָּ <WH5849> Thou crownest שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> the year טוֹבָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2896> with thy goodness וּ֝מַעְגָּלֶ֗יךָ <WH4570> and thy paths יִרְעֲפ֥וּן <WH7491> drop דָּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1880> fatness

יִ֭רְעֲפוּ <WH7491> They drop נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> [upon] the pastures מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וְ֝גִ֗יל <WH1524> rejoice גְּבָע֥וֹת <WH1389> and the little hills תַּחְגֹּֽרְנָה׃ <WH2296> on every side

לָבְשׁ֬וּ <WH3847> are clothed כָרִ֨ים ׀ <WH3733> The pastures הַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> with flocks וַעֲמָקִ֥ים <WH6010> the valleys יַֽעַטְפוּ־ <WH5848> also are covered over בָ֑ר <WH1250> with corn יִ֝תְרוֹעֲע֗וּ <WH7321> they shout for joy אַף־ <WH637> yes יָשִֽׁירוּ׃ <WH7891> they also sing
